      public static void connectFour()
      Handles the setup (board size, game mode) for Connect Four and then launches the game.

    • gameLoop

      public static void gameLoop(int rows, int cols, String gameMode)
      The main game loop for Connect Four
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows in the board
      cols - The number of columns in the board
      gameMode - 1 for single-player, 2 for two-player

    • initializeBoard

      public static char[][] initializeBoard(int rows, int cols)
      Creates a new Connect Four board filled with empty slots.
      Parameters:
      rows - Number of rows.
      cols - Number of columns.
      Returns:
      The initialized 2D char array.

    • printBoard

      public static void printBoard(char[][] board)
      Prints the Connect Four board to the console.
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board.

    • getPlayerMove

      public static int getPlayerMove(char[][] board, char player)
      Gets a valid column move from a human player.
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board.
      player - The character representing the player.
      Returns:
      The 0-based column index, or -1 if the player quits.

    • getComputerMove

      public static int getComputerMove(char[][] board)
      Gets a valid random column move for the computer.
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board.
      Returns:
      The 0-based column index.

    • isValidMove

      public static boolean isValidMove(char[][] board, int col)
      Checks if a move is valid (i.e., the column is not full).
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board.
      col - The 0-based column index.
      Returns:
      true if the column is not full, false otherwise.

    • dropDisc

      public static void dropDisc(char[][] board, int col, char player)
      "Drops" a disc into the specified column.
      Parameters:
      board - The game board (will be modified).
      col - The 0-based column index.
      player - The player's disc character.

    • isBoardFull

      public static boolean isBoardFull(char[][] board)
      Checks if the board is completely full (a draw condition).
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board.
      Returns:
      true if the board is full, false otherwise.

    • checkWin

      public static boolean checkWin(char[][] board, char player)
      Checks the entire board for a 4-in-a-row win for the specified player.
      Parameters:
      board - The current game board.
      player - The player's disc character to check for.
      Returns:
      true if a win is found, false otherwise.

    • clearScreen

      public static void clearScreen()
      Clears the screen.

    • waitMillis

      public static void waitMillis(long periodMillis)
      Waits for a specified amount of time.
      Parameters:
      periodMillis - A variable to specify the time in milliseconds that program will wait whenever the method is called.

    • waitBeforeProceed

      public static void waitBeforeProceed()
      Prompts the user for a keystroke "ENTER" to proceed so that they will have the time to stop before moving on whatever's next after something's done.
